title: What now?
content: It's time to start development! We're open for new ideas. Development for the initial three projects is on the way. Keep an eye on our socials cos we're constantly updating. Join in as a developer to work with us!

title: SOOOON...
content: We're setting up a lot of internal software tools. Automating management of projects and people. We'll have a ratings system, a profile page, the whole works. Need lots of developers. We're looking to you to contribute!

title: LATERRRR~
content: It's monthly developer meeting time! Project progression checks, meeetups with alumni and professionals, it’s networking hour at iDEA. Retrospect on your projects and get valuable feedback.

title: /FARRR FUTURE/
content: We’re planning to have bi annual events to showcase our development projects every year, one of which will be part of the annual tech feast, Ankoha.

title: INCEPTION
content: We have a dream. A world where cool ideas come to fruition in real time, with support and mentorship on offer at every step. A world where students and the community in general benefit from innovative ideas.
